name: simplr for flickr
description: A cleaner and simpler style for viewing the 'new flickr'. Removes the banner and reduces the screen-space that the banner used. Provides a light-grey background for the header and photo pages. Moves the pop-up title bar to below the image, rather than partially obscuring it. Also increases the initial size of the text insertion box for comments.
additional_info:
V1.2 (08-JUN-13) - addition to move the hover-over/pop-up title to below the image
V1.1 (07-JUN-13) - minor change to make all pages entirely light-grey
V1.0 (06-JUN-13) - first release
